mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (account_id, name, token,bio,avatar_url, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{accountId},#{name},#{token},#{bio},#{avatarUrl},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified})
mapper.select: select id,account_id accountId, name, token,bio,avatar_url avatarUrl, gmt_create gmtCreate, gmt_modified gmtModified from tb_user where token = #{token}
